title: Oatmeal chia seed cookies
ingredients: ['160g oats', '220g soft brown sugar', '80g wholemeal flour', '2 tablespoons chia seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '160ml apple sauce or apple puree', '3 tablespoons coconut oil', '120g dried cranberries', '80g chocolate chips (optional)', '25g coconut flakes (optional)']
